column1: Smoque BBQ////Not impressed.. heard rave reviews from co-workers and even saw a blurb about it on TV. But honestly didn't have anything that was "great" just kinda OK... not a fan of the runny BBQ sauce. Tried the pulled pork and the brisket.. brisket was mushy and fatty.. pork was stringy and tough.. The Brisket Chili was decent
column2: although it was near boiling when we got it
column3: couldn't eat it until almost the end of our meal.. Also the "shot glass" size Mac n Cheese was tasty
column4: but seems like they could have had served a slightly larger portion. Â Maybe it was a bad night for Smoque
column5: but I've definitely had better BBQ elsewhere..
